name: Candy Shapes-Free Puzzle Maker
description:
Break and blast bricks of candy in the relaxing puzzle game. Made for people of all ages and cultural backgrounds. This game includes 4 different game modes: Classic, Bomb, Advanced & Time limit. They will test you mentally but also calm you internally. Have fun and get to Candy blasting!

Spring has sprung in Candy Shapes Block World, build and match colorful candies to smash and score high.

Start playing Candy Shapes Puzzles today – loved by millions of users around the world. This mouth-watering puzzle game will instantly satisfy your thirst for candy fun.

Candy Shapes Puzzles Game is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment with real money. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

This fun new Candy Shapes game is filled with fun treats and more! Your favorite game modes, but sweeter than ever!

How to play:

- Build different colors of candies and complete rows and columns to score points
- Try to solve Candy puzzles by logically placing the candies.
- Match 1,2,3,4 or more candies to create candy shapes and score points
- Easy to play but challenging to master.

Candy Shapes Puzzles features:

* Candy levels with 4 challenging levels in different scenarios
* Completely free to play
* Sweet and delicious UI & cool animation effects.
* Easy and fun to start but a challenge to fully master
* Suitable for all countries and all ages
* 4 interesting candy shape levels!
* Relaxing and addictive Candy match levels
* Mouth-watering new graphics, Candy shapes never looked so tasty
* Mesmerizing candles to break and progress
* Relaxing and fun to play game and yet challenging
* Mesmerizing candles to break and progress
* Break & Blast Bricks of Candy!
* Easy to play but challenging to master!
* Play whenever, online and offline.

Have fun and enjoy the candy shapes puzzles on Apple store!
